UNTDID9013Type.title: Status description code
UNTDID9013Type.description:
Code specifying a status.

Applicable codes:
* '1' - Arrival, completed
* '2' - Loading, authorized
* '3' - Arrival, in defective condition
* '4' - Defective equipment returned to service
* '5' - Process, begun
* '6' - Booking, completed
* '7' - Booking, cancelled
* '8' - Cleared, import restrictions
